title: Close Encounters
description:
Today's episode contains true stories from people who have had close encounters of a strange kid. First, Sapphire shares a tale from a firefighter in Montana, about his run in with the Men in Black. Then, we'll investigate a mysterious green light, meet some strangers at a beach, and explore an abandoned cabin in the forest. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
